title: Armed and Dangerous (1996) Bob Hall Acclaim Comics
description:

 Armed & Dangerous focuses around Eddy Donovan, a fifteen-year-old kid whoÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s been raised in a boarding school after his parents died. HeÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s been called down to New York City by his Uncle Mitch and is discovering that life in the Big Apple is hard for a kid on his own. One day, heÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s sent to deliver a strangely heavy pizza box to his Uncle Mitch in room 41 of a seedy hotel. When he gets there, he discovers a room stained with blood, a body on a bed, and that the Ã¢â‚¬Å“pizza boxÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ was full of tools Mitch needed to dismember the body. In short, Eddy Donovan had just discovered the family businessÃ¢â‚¬â€and it was already too late to decide whether or not he wanted to join it.
